items.techStack: Next.js, typescript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Stripe payment, JWT
items.title: E-Shop
items.desc: An eCommerce platform, offering a wide range of electronic products.It provides an user-friendly interface, diverse product categories, and secure online shopping experiences.
features: Stripe payment system for user-friendly checkout process
Admin dashboard to manage his orders, to create, delete and update his products
Allow users to leave feedback ratings  based on five stars

items.title: Airbnb-clone
items.desc: A full-stack web app where hosts can list their properties, including descriptions, photos etc.,  guests/users can rent homes, apartments and can create a wishlist to visit in the future.
features: Stripe payment system for user-friendly checkout process
Admin dashboard to manage his orders, to create, delete and update his products
Allow users to leave feedback ratings  based on five stars

items.techStack: Next.js, typescript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redux RTK Query, JWt and Supabase
items.title: Booking app
items.desc: A full stack web app where a user can book an appointment for different services like booking a car or booking a time for servicing their vehicles. A super admin can create admins and the admin can control their own dashboard - create, edit and delete.
features: Stripe payment system for user-friendly checkout process
Admin dashboard to manage his orders, to create, delete and update his products
Allow users to leave feedback ratings  based on five stars

items.tecStack: React.js, typescript, Node.js, Express, JWt and MongoDB Database
items.title: React Blog
items.desc: A full stack web app where a user can read articles on different topics like software technology. A super admin can create admins and the admin can control their own dashboard - create, edit and delete.

Admin dashboard to manage his orders, to create, delete and update his products
